description: Specifies a choice ID and optional user-facing text.

id.description: A string representing this choice, as it will be recorded in the database. Required.

text.description: User-facing text; can be more verbose than 'id'. Defaults to contents of 'id'.

correct.description: True if this is the 'correct' response. If no choices are correct, then no scoring is performed.

textColor.description: Specify button text color e.g. #FF0000 for red or 'green' for color green

backgroundColor.description: Specify button background color e.g. #FF0000 for red or 'green' for color green

fontSize.description: Specify button text size in pixels e.g. 20px
